description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results of the Morningstar® Exponential Technologies IndexSM which composed of stocks of developed and emerging market companies that create or use exponential technologies.
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its assets in the component securities of the underlying index and in investments that have economic characteristics that are substantially identical to the component securities of the underlying index. The underlying index is a subset of the Morningstar US Market Index and the Morningstar Global Markets ex-US Index family.
